named-query.name: EP_RULE_BASE_FIND_CHANGED_CATALOGCODE_SCENARIO
named-query.query: SELECT rb FROM EpRuleBaseImpl rb WHERE rb.catalog.code = ?1 AND rb.store IS NULL AND rb.scenarioId = ?2 AND rb.lastModifiedDate > ?3

named-query.name: EP_RULE_BASE_FIND_CHANGED_STORECODE_SCENARIO
named-query.query: SELECT rb FROM EpRuleBaseImpl rb WHERE rb.store.code = ?1 AND rb.catalog IS NULL AND rb.scenarioId = ?2 AND rb.lastModifiedDate > ?3

named-query.name: EP_RULE_BASE_FIND_BY_STORE_SCENARIO
named-query.query: SELECT rb FROM EpRuleBaseImpl rb WHERE rb.store.uidPk = ?1 AND rb.scenarioId = ?2

named-query.name: EP_RULE_BASE_FIND_BY_CATALOG_SCENARIO
named-query.query: SELECT rb FROM EpRuleBaseImpl rb WHERE rb.catalog.uidPk = ?1 AND rb.scenarioId = ?2

named-query.name: EP_RULE_BASE_FIND_BY_STORE_CATALOG_SCENARIO
named-query.query: SELECT rb FROM EpRuleBaseImpl rb WHERE rb.store.uidPk = ?1 AND rb.catalog.uidPk = ?2 AND rb.scenarioId = ?3

named-query.name: RULE_FIND_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: RULE_FIND_BY_NOT_UIDS_IN_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.uidPk not in (:list) AND r.store.uidPk in (:store_uids)

named-query.name: RULE_FIND_IN_STORE_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.store.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: RULE_SELECT_ACTIVE_COUNT_NUM
named-query.query: SELECT count(r) FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE (r.startDate is null or r.startDate <= ?1 ) AND ( r.endDate is null or r.endDate >=?2 )

named-query.name: RULE_FIND_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.name = ?1

named-query.name: RULE_UIDS_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT r.uidPk FROM PromotionRuleImpl as r

named-query.name: RULE_UIDS_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT r.uidPk FROM PromotionRuleImpl as r WHERE r.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: RULE_UIDS_SCOPE_CHANGED
named-query.query: SELECT r.uidPk FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE ((r.startDate <= ?1 AND r.startDate >= ?2) OR (r.endDate <= ?1 AND r.endDate >= ?2)) AND r.ruleSet.scenario = ?3

named-query.name: RULE_FIND_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.code = ?1

named-query.name: RULE_FIND_BY_CODES
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.code IN (:list)

named-query.name: FIND_LUP_BY_RULECODE
named-query.query: SELECT r.currentLupNumber FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.code = ?1

named-query.name: ACTIVE_RULEID_AND_SELLINGCONTEXT_FIND_BY_SCENARIO_AND_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT rule.uidPk, rule.sellingContext FROM PromotionRuleImpl rule WHERE rule.enabled = true AND (rule.endDate is null OR rule.endDate > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND rule.ruleSet.scenario = ?1 AND rule.store.code = ?2

named-query.name: RULE_FIND_BY_COUPON_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT new com.elasticpath.domain.rules.impl.PromotionRuleImpl(r.uidPk, r.store.code, r.enabled, r.startDate, r.endDate,r.sellingContext, r.currentLupNumber) FROM PromotionRuleImpl r, CouponImpl c WHERE r.code = c.couponConfig.ruleCode AND c.couponCode = ?1

named-query.name: RULE_LIMITED_USE_CONDITION_ID_FIND_BY_COUPON_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT ruleElements.uidPk FROM PromotionRuleImpl r, CouponImpl c LEFT OUTER JOIN r.ruleElements ruleElements WHERE r.code = c.couponConfig.ruleCode AND ruleElements.type = 'limitedUseCouponCodeCondition' AND c.couponCode = ?1

named-query.name: RULE_MAP_BY_PROMO_CODES
named-query.query: SELECT c.couponCode, new com.elasticpath.domain.rules.impl.PromotionRuleImpl(r.uidPk, r.store.code, r.enabled, r.startDate, r.endDate, r.sellingContext, r.currentLupNumber) FROM PromotionRuleImpl r, CouponImpl c WHERE r.code = c.couponConfig.ruleCode AND c.couponCode IN (:promoCodes)

named-query.name: RULE_ID_FIND_BY_COUPON_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT new com.elasticpath.domain.rules.impl.PromotionRuleImpl(r.uidPk) FROM PromotionRuleImpl r, CouponImpl c WHERE r.code = c.couponConfig.ruleCode AND c.couponCode = ?1

named-query.name: RULE_ALLOWED_LIMIT_FIND_BY_RULE_ID
named-query.query: SELECT params.value FROM PromotionRuleImpl r LEFT JOIN r.ruleElements ruleElements LEFT JOIN ruleElements.parameters params WHERE r.uidPk = ?1 AND params.key='allowedLimit'

named-query.name: RULE_CODE_BY_UID
named-query.query: SELECT r.code FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: RULE_CODE_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT r.code FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: RULES_BY_SCENARIO_AND_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.ruleSet.scenario = ?1 AND UPPER(r.store.code) = UPPER(?2)

named-query.name: RULES_MAPPED_BY_COUPON_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c.couponCode, r FROM PromotionRuleImpl r, CouponImpl c WHERE r.code = c.couponConfig.ruleCode AND c.couponCode IN (:list)

named-query.name: PROMOTION_NAME_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT r.name FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.code = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_COUPON_ASSIGNMENT_PROMOS_FOR_A_UIDPK_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT r.uidPk FROM PromotionRuleImpl r WHERE r.code IN (SELECT p.value FROM PromotionRuleImpl r, in(r.ruleElements) e, in(e.parameters) p WHERE p.key = ?1 AND r.uidPk IN (:list))

named-query.name: RULE_PARAMETER_VALUE_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT rp.value FROM RuleParameterImpl as rp WHERE rp.key = ?1

named-query.name: RULESET_SELECT_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT rs FROM RuleSetImpl rs

named-query.name: RULE_SET_SELECT_BY_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT rs FROM RuleSetImpl rs WHERE rs.lastModifiedDate >= ?1

named-query.name: RULESET_FIND_BY_SCENARIO
named-query.query: SELECT rs FROM RuleSetImpl rs WHERE rs.scenario = ?1

named-query.name: RULESET_FIND_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT rs FROM RuleSetImpl rs WHERE rs.name = ?1

named-query.name: RULE_SET_UPDATE_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: UPDATE RuleSetImpl rs SET rs.lastModifiedDate = ?2 WHERE rs.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_FIND_BY_COUPON_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CouponImpl c WHERE UPPER(c.couponCode) = UPPER(?1)

named-query.name: COUPON_FIND_BY_RULE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponConfig.ruleCode =?1

named-query.name: COUPON_FIND_UNUSED_COUPON_FOR_RULE_CODE_AND_EMAIL
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CouponImpl c JOIN c.couponConfig cc WHERE cc.ruleCode = ?1 AND cc.usageType = 'limitPerSpecifiedUser' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT cu.useCount FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.uidPk = c.uidPk AND cu.customerEmailAddress = ?2) AND c.suspended = false

named-query.name: COUPON_FIND_BY_RULE_CODE_FROM_COUPON_CODES
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponConfig.ruleCode = ?1 AND c.couponCode IN (:list)

named-query.name: COUPON_FIND_BY_RULE_UID_FROM_COUPON_CODES
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CouponImpl c, PromotionRuleImpl pr WHERE c.couponConfig.ruleCode = pr.code AND pr.uidPk = ?1 AND c.couponCode IN (:list)

named-query.name: COUPON_DELETE_BY_COUPON_CONFIG_GUID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponConfig.guid = ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_CODES_FIND_FROM_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT c.couponCode FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponCode IN (:list)

named-query.name: COUPON_CODES_NOT_RULE_CODE_FIND_FROM_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT c.couponCode FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponCode IN (:list) AND c.couponConfig.ruleCode <> ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_CODES_BY_COUPON_CODE_NOT_RULE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c.couponCode FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponCode = ?1 AND c.couponConfig.ruleCode <> ?2

named-query.name: COUPON_CODES_BY_RULE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c.couponCode FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponConfig.ruleCode = ?1

named-query.name: COUPONS_FIND_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: COUPON_MAP_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT c.couponCode, c FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponCode IN (:list)

named-query.name: COUPON_LIKE_CODE_PREFIX_DESC
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM CouponImpl c WHERE c.couponCode LIKE ?1 ORDER BY c.couponCode DESC

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_FIND_BY_COUPON_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT cu FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.couponCode = ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_USECOUNT_FIND_BY_COUPON_CODE_AND_EMAIL_ADDRESS
named-query.query: SELECT sum(cu.useCount) FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.couponCode = ?1 AND cu.customerEmailAddress = ?2

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_FIND_BY_RULE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT cu FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.couponConfig.ruleCode = ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_FIND_BY_COUPON_CODE_AND_EMAIL_ADDRESS
named-query.query: SELECT cu FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.couponCode = ?1 AND cu.customerEmailAddress = ?2

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_FIND_BY_RULE_CODE_AND_EMAIL_ADDRESS
named-query.query: SELECT cu FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.couponConfig.ruleCode = ?1 AND cu.customerEmailAddress = ?2

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_FIND_BY_EMAIL_ELIGIBLE_IN_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT cu FROM CouponUsageImpl cu, PromotionRuleImpl pr INNER JOIN cu.coupon c WHERE cu.customerEmailAddress = ?1 AND (cu.limitedDurationEndDate IS NULL OR cu.limitedDurationEndDate >= ?2 ) AND (cu.coupon.couponConfig.usageLimit = 0 OR cu.coupon.couponConfig.usageLimit > cu.useCount ) AND pr.code = c.couponConfig.ruleCode AND pr.store.uidPk = ?3 AND cu.suspendedInternal = false AND cu.coupon.suspended = false

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_FIND_FOR_COUPON_EMAIL_RULE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT cu FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.couponCode = ?1 AND cu.customerEmailAddress = ?2 AND cu.coupon.couponConfig.ruleCode = ?3

named-query.name: RULES_USAGE_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT o.currency, s.code, ar.ruleUid, ar.ruleName, ar.ruleName, r.startDate, r.endDate, rs.scenario, sum(o.total), count(o.orderNumber), count(o.orderNumber) FROM OrderImpl o, StoreImpl s, PromotionRuleImpl r, RuleSetImpl rs INNER JOIN o.appliedRules ar WHERE s.code = o.storeCode AND o.status <> 'FAILED' AND s.uidPk IN (:list) AND r.uidPk = ar.ruleUid AND (o.currency = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND (o.createdDate >= ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (o.createdDate <= ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) AND (rs.scenario = r.ruleSet.scenario AND (r.ruleSet.scenario = ?4 OR ?4 = 0)) GROUP BY o.currency, s.code, ar.ruleUid, ar.ruleName, r.startDate, r.endDate, rs.scenario

named-query.name: RULES_USAGE_COUPONS_ONLY
named-query.query: SELECT o.currency, s.code, ar.ruleUid, ar.ruleName, ar.ruleName, r.startDate, r.endDate, rs.scenario, sum(o.total), count(o.orderNumber), count(o.orderNumber) FROM OrderImpl o, StoreImpl s, PromotionRuleImpl r, RuleSetImpl rs INNER JOIN o.appliedRules ar INNER JOIN ar.appliedCoupons ac WHERE s.code = o.storeCode AND o.status <> 'FAILED' AND s.uidPk IN (:list) AND r.uidPk = ar.ruleUid AND (o.currency = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND (o.createdDate >= ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (o.createdDate<= ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) AND (rs.scenario = r.ruleSet.scenario AND (r.ruleSet.scenario = ?4 OR ?4 = 0)) GROUP BY o.currency, s.code, ar.ruleUid, ar.ruleName, r.startDate, r.endDate, rs.scenario

named-query.name: RULES_USAGE_TOTAL_ORDERS
named-query.query: SELECT o.currency, s.code, count(o.orderNumber) FROM OrderImpl o, StoreImpl s WHERE s.code = o.storeCode AND o.status <> 'FAILED' AND s.uidPk IN (:list) AND (o.currency = ?1 OR ?1 IS NULL) AND (o.createdDate >= ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (o.createdDate<= ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) GROUP BY o.currency, s.code

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_DELETE_BY_COUPON_CONFIG_GUID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.coupon.couponConfig.guid = ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_USAGE_FIND_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT cu FROM CouponUsageImpl cu WHERE cu.uidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: PROMOTION_DETAILS
named-query.query: SELECT o.orderNumber, o.createdDate, o.customer.userId, ac.couponCode, o.currency, o.total FROM OrderImpl o, StoreImpl s, PromotionRuleImpl r, RuleSetImpl rs INNER JOIN o.appliedRules ar LEFT OUTER JOIN ar.appliedCoupons ac WHERE s.code = o.storeCode AND o.status <> 'FAILED' AND r.uidPk = ar.ruleUid AND s.uidPk = ?1 AND (o.currency = ?2 OR ?2 IS NULL) AND (o.createdDate >= ?3 OR ?3 IS NULL) AND o.createdDate<= ?4 AND (rs.scenario = r.ruleSet.scenario AND (r.ruleSet.scenario = 1)) AND r.code = ?5 AND (ac.couponCode = ?6 OR ?6 IS NULL)

named-query.name: COUPON_CONFIG_BY_RULE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT cc FROM CouponConfigImpl cc WHERE cc.ruleCode = ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_CONFIG_BY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT cc FROM CouponConfigImpl cc WHERE cc.guid = ?1

named-query.name: COUPON_CONFIG_GUID_BY_RULE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT cc.guid FROM CouponConfigImpl cc WHERE cc.ruleCode = ?1
